description: Lists the status of one or more table restore requests made using the  RestoreTableFromClusterSnapshot API action. If you don't specify a value for the TableRestoreRequestId parameter, then DescribeTableRestoreStatus returns the status of all table restore requests ordered by the date and time of the request in ascending order. Otherwise DescribeTableRestoreStatus returns the status of the table specified by TableRestoreRequestId.

nested_items.name: TableRestoreStatusDetails
nested_items.description: A list of status details for one or more table restore requests.

nested_items.name: TableRestoreRequestId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the table restore request.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: A value that describes the current state of the table restore request.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A description of the status of the table restore request. Status values include SUCCEEDED, FAILED, CANCELED, PENDING, IN_PROGRESS.

nested_items.name: RequestTime
nested_items.description: The time that the table restore request was made, in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

nested_items.name: ProgressInMegaBytes
nested_items.description: The amount of data restored to the new table so far, in megabytes (MB).

nested_items.name: TotalDataInMegaBytes
nested_items.description: The total amount of data to restore to the new table, in megabytes (MB).

nested_items.name: ClusterIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Redshift cluster that the table is being restored to.

nested_items.name: SnapshotIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of the snapshot that the table is being restored from.

nested_items.name: SourceDatabaseName
nested_items.description: The name of the source database that contains the table being restored.

nested_items.name: SourceSchemaName
nested_items.description: The name of the source schema that contains the table being restored.

nested_items.name: SourceTableName
nested_items.description: The name of the source table being restored.

nested_items.name: TargetDatabaseName
nested_items.description: The name of the database to restore the table to.

nested_items.name: TargetSchemaName
nested_items.description: The name of the schema to restore the table to.

nested_items.name: NewTableName
nested_items.description: The name of the table to create as a result of the table restore request.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: A pagination token that can be used in a subsequent  DescribeTableRestoreStatus request.
